00007 struct ParameterDesc
00008 {
00009     std::string type_specifier;
00010     std::string name;
00011     std::string default_value;
00012 };
00013 
00014 typedef std::vector<ParameterDesc> ParameterList;

00016 struct TypeDesc;

00018 struct PropertyDesc
00019 {
00020     enum Type
00021     {
00022         SIMPLE  = 0,
00023         ARRAY   = 1,
00024         INDEXED = 2
00025     };
00026 
00027     std::string get_method;
00028     std::string set_method;
00029     std::string add_method;
00030     std::string insert_method;
00031     std::string remove_method;
00032     std::string count_method;
00033 
00034     Type type;
00035     std::string name;
00036     std::string type_name;
00037 };
00038 
00039 typedef std::vector<PropertyDesc> PropertyList;
00040 
00041 struct FunctionDesc
00042 {
00043     std::string name_signature;
00044     
00045     std::string return_type_specifier;
00046     std::string name;
00047     ParameterList params;
00048     bool is_static;
00049     bool is_virtual;
00050     bool is_pure_virtual;
00051     bool is_explicit;
00052     
00053     std::string briefHelp;
00054     std::string detailedHelp;
00055     
00056     bool is_constructor(const TypeDesc &decltype) const;
00057     bool is_default_constructor(const TypeDesc &decltype) const;
00058     bool is_destructor() const { return name[0] == '~'; }
00059     std::string get_signature() const;
00060     void gen_name_signature();
00061     void gen_type_name_signature(std::string &str) const;
00062     bool valid() const { return !name.empty(); }
00063     FunctionDesc() :
00064         is_static(false),
00065         is_virtual(false),
00066         is_pure_virtual(false),
00067         is_explicit(false)
00068     {
00069     }
00070 };
00071 
00072 typedef std::vector<FunctionDesc> FunctionList;
00073 
00074 
00075 struct AttributDesc
00076 {
00077   std::string type;
00078   std::string name;
00079   bool is_const;
00080   bool is_static;
00081   bool valid() const { return ((!name.empty()) && (!type.empty())); }
00082   AttributDesc() : is_static(false) {}
00083   AttributDesc(std::string t, std::string n, bool s = false) : type(t), name(n), is_static(s) {}
00084 };
00085 
00086 typedef std::vector<AttributDesc> AttributList;
00087 
00088 
00089 typedef std::vector<std::string> StringList;
00090 
00091 struct BaseTypeDesc
00092 {
00093     std::string name;
00094     bool is_virtual;
00095     BaseTypeDesc(): is_virtual(false) {}
00096     BaseTypeDesc(const std::string &n, bool v = false): name(n), is_virtual(v) {}
00097 };
00098 
00099 typedef std::vector<BaseTypeDesc> BaseTypeList;
00100 
00101 struct TypeDesc
00102 {
00103     bool undefined;
00104     std::string alias;    // for typedef's
00105     std::string declaring_file_name;
00106     std::string type_name;
00107     BaseTypeList base_types;
00108     StringList enum_labels;
00109     StringList needed_headers;
00110     FunctionList methods;
00111     FunctionList priv_methods;
00112     AttributList public_attrib;
00113     PropertyList properties;
00114     ParameterList template_params;
00115     bool is_abstract;
00116     bool default_constructor_private;
00117     bool has_custom_constructors;
00118     bool destructor_private;
00119     bool is_namespace;
00120 
00121     std::string briefHelp;
00122     std::string detailedHelp;
00123 
00124     TypeDesc() 
00125     :    undefined(false),
00126         is_abstract(false), 
00127         default_constructor_private(false), 
00128         has_custom_constructors(false),
00129         destructor_private(false),
00130         is_namespace(false)
00131     {
00132     }
00133 };
